/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, providing a green canopy and a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
